slide.title: A RESTful Poem
slide.blurb:
Proponents of REST hope
People will realize that HTTP is dope
Can't you see? ~XML based webservices are bloat~
Those who use them have missed the boat
Roy Fielding is certainly a nice bloke
But my god, he must toke
What's this about many nouns and a verb?
That's perfect proof you're on the herb!
